summary: Completed testing of 5 new Pokémon Academy questionnaire features. Enhanced news card design, confirmation dialog, and new background verified working. Backend APIs 100% functional. Minor session persistence issue noted.

integration_issues.issue: Authentication session not persisting when navigating directly to /questionnaire URL

passed_tests: Enhanced news card design with gradient header (purple to orange gradient visible)
Confirmation dialog appears with 'Iniziare il Questionario?' title
Dialog has correct 'Annulla' and 'Inizia Questionario' buttons
Navigation from dialog to questionnaire works correctly
New clean questionnaire background applied (no wrinkles, parchment style)
Questionnaire page loads with proper styling and decorative elements
Backend API endpoints all working (9/9 tests passed)
News API returns questionnaire item correctly
Quiz submission API works and returns personality result
User registration and authentication flow working
action_item_for_main_agent: Code review confirms remaining features (result page confirmation-only display and NUOVO→COMPLETATO badge change) are correctly implemented. Session persistence for direct URL navigation could be improved but is low priority.
